data.description: Perl Win32 Memory Mapped File Facility
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is designed primarily for shared memory support under
    Windows using the native Windows memory mapped file mechanism. There
    is the great IPC package for inter-process communication, but
    thatâs only for *nix type of environments. Perlâs shared memory
    support under Windows is currently a grey area.
